info.name: Thunderbird - Shades of Gray
info.description: Really wanted a clean dark theme, but no good ones that I liked existed. Created this and realized how easy (and a bit of a pain) it was to make one. This includes a slightly modified Twister's Labels. Hope you enjoy!
info.additionalInfo: RECOMMENDATIONS: - Install a simple dark theme with white icons (I'm using Dark Black by rtodorovsky) - Don't forget to change link colors for folders from Options > Options > Display > Colors... FEEDBACK: Greatly encouraged, I'm sure there are some bugs. You should treat this as v0.1 for now. NOTES: Window control buttons (minimize, maximize, close) are controlled by OS and I'm currently using Windows 10. Your mileage will vary in that section based on your OS.
